author: chirino
msg: Rename DirectBuffer* to ZeroCopy* as it's more descriptive of what it's trying to accomplish (folks might have thought DirectBuffer was for direct io or something).

author: gtully
msg: resolve https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3122 - ignore zero length journal files on start, sync write state on shutdown to ensure metadata is not ahead of journal in the event of no space on disk and journal write failure
